thread.title: Two Children Killed in Brooklyn After Being Hit by Car

author: Melanie Grayce West
title: Two Children Killed in Brooklyn After Being Hit by Car
text:
Two children were struck and killed by a car while in a crosswalk in the Park Slope neighborhood of Brooklyn on Monday afternoon, police said, at an intersection that has long been considered hazardous for pedestrians.
The girl, Abigail Blumenstein, was 4 years old and the boy, Joshua Lew, was 20 months old, officials said. Abigail’s mother, 34-year-old Ruthie Ann Blumenstein, who is pregnant, was hit by the car and was taken to Brooklyn Methodist Hospital in critical condition, law-enforcement officials said.
